operations.summary: Returns a list of all OTP Delivery Mechanism objects

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: SCIM filter

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Specifies a property value by which to sort

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Specifies either ascending or descending alphabetical order

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of the first result to return

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Indicates the number of results per page

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response

parameters.name: excludeAttributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to exclude from the response

responseMessages.message: The requested operation succeeded
The requested operation succeeded and no further information has been provided, such as in the case of a DELETE operation.
The request contents are incorrectly formatted or the request was made for an invalid API version.
The requester cannot be authenticated
The requester does not have the required privileges or another constraint failed, such as attempting to delete an edit-only object.
The requested path does not refer to an existing object or object relation.

The requested operation could not be performed due to the current state of the configuration. For example, an attempt was made to create an object that already exists or an attempt was made to delete an object that is referred to by another object.
The request is such that the Accept header does not indicate that JSON is an acceptable format for a response.
The server encountered an unexpected error.

add-otp-delivery-mechanism-request.description: A OTP Delivery Mechanism resource request

mechanismName.description: Name of the new OTP Delivery Mechanism

extensionClass.description: The fully-qualified name of the Java class providing the logic for the Third Party OTP Delivery Mechanism.

senderAddress.description: The e-mail address to use as the sender for the one-time password.

twilioAuthTokenPassphraseProvider.description: The passphrase provider that may be used to obtain the auth token for the Twilio account that will be used.

senderPhoneNumber.description: The outgoing phone number to use for the messages. Values must be phone numbers you have obtained for use with your Twilio account.

messageSubject.description: The subject to use for the e-mail message.

twilioAccountSID.description: The unique identifier assigned to the Twilio account that will be used.

phoneNumberAttributeType.description: The name or OID of the attribute in the user's entry that holds the phone number to which the message should be sent.

phoneNumberJSONField.description: The name of the JSON field whose value is the phone number to which the message should be sent. The phone number must be contained in a top-level field whose value is a single string.

twilioAuthToken.description: The auth token for the Twilio account that will be used.

phoneNumberJSONObjectFilter.description: A JSON object filter that may be used to identify which phone number value to use when sending the message.

description.description: A description for this OTP Delivery Mechanism

emailAddressJSONField.description: The name of the JSON field whose value is the email address to which the message should be sent. The email address must be contained in a top-level field whose value is a single string.

enabled.description: Indicates whether this OTP Delivery Mechanism is enabled for use in the server.

extensionArgument.description: The set of arguments used to customize the behavior for the Third Party OTP Delivery Mechanism. Each configuration property should be given in the form 'name=value'.

messageTextAfterOTP.description: Any text that should appear in the message after the one-time password value.

messageTextBeforeOTP.description: Any text that should appear in the message before the one-time password value.

emailAddressAttributeType.description: The name or OID of the attribute that holds the email address to which the message should be sent.

httpProxyExternalServer.description: A reference to an HTTP proxy server that should be used for requests sent to the Twilio service.

emailAddressJSONObjectFilter.description: A JSON object filter that may be used to identify which email address value to use when sending the message.
